markdown-linting-violations.name: markdown-linting-violations
markdown-linting-violations.description: Missing code language tags, emphasis as headings, missing blank lines around structures and horizontal rules
markdown-linting-violations.remediation: Add language tags (bash/text/json), use proper # headings, add blank lines around structures (headings, lists, code blocks, horizontal rules)

detectionRules.MD040: Code blocks starting with ``` followed by newline (no language tag)
detectionRules.MD036: Lines starting with ** or * containing : or structural content
detectionRules.MD022: Headings not surrounded by blank lines
detectionRules.MD022-HR: Horizontal rules (---) not surrounded by blank lines
detectionRules.MD031: Code fences not surrounded by blank lines
detectionRules.MD032: Lists not surrounded by blank lines
